TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PngInterlaceOption extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies whether a Portable Network Graphics (PNG) format image is interlaced during encoding.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Interlacing refers to the process of displaying a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] frame in two fields. One field contains the even lines of the frame, while the other field contains the odd lines of the frame. When the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] is viewed, the lines in one field are displayed first, and then the lines in the second field are displayed.
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.PngBitmapEncoder.Interlace%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.PngBitmapEncoder> class.
[!code-cpp[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/PngEncoderDecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/PngEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/PngEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Imaging.PngInterlaceOption Default = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The determines whether the image should be interlaced.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Imaging.PngInterlaceOption Off = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The resulting bitmap image is not interlaced.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Imaging.PngInterlaceOption On = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The resulting bitmap image is interlaced.
